course_title: Advancing Behavior Change for Improved Health Outcomes
course_description: Students will examine the emerging evidence and begin to apply methods facilitating health behavior change based on neurological and psychological interventions. The learner will practice integrating these patient-centered care methods to improve health and reduce societal costs of health care.
sections: Class Nbr: 4285, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: W 9-10:50a, Instructor: Wright/Smart, Status: Open
